conclusion: Analyze contributions from both straight and curved parts of the wire frame.
Wire frame consists of a straight part MN and a semicircular part; radius is r; force on MN is F; magnetic field is uniform and perpendicular.
Length of the straight part MN is 2r.
Current I through the wire is I = F / (2Br).
Length of the semicircular part is Ï€r.
Force on the semicircular part is also F.
Total Ampere force on the entire wire frame is 2F.
